snippet: The Bengals (8-6) took a half-game lead over the Pittsburgh Steelers (7-6) for the last playoff spot in the A.F.C.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cincinnati Bengals defeat Philadelphia Eagles, 34-13; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bengals (8-6) took a half-game lead over the Pittsburgh Steelers (7-6) for the last playoff spot in the A.F.C.

headline.seo: Giants’ Amukamara Could Miss Falcons Game
headline.main: Dalton and Bengals Beat Eagles and Look Toward Steelers
headline.print_headline: Dalton and Bengals Beat Eagles and Look Toward Steelers
